title: LF Duo Bot Lane or solo adc and support.
body:
Hey guys me and a couple of mates are looking to create a serious ranked 5's team to climb the ladder this season. Currently we have a Gold 5, Gold 3, Plat 4 and a Plat 3. We are looking for high Gold + Support.  Add me on League Of Legends.
LoL Name:SirKurt

replies.body: gold 3 support, interested, will add you ingame
tbh, Go improve your own indivdual play, You wont climb anywhere.
